item.title: nMOLDYN
item.dc:creator: linux4chemistry
item.description: nMOLDYN is an interactive analysis program for Molecular Dynamics simulations. It is especially designed for the computation and decomposition of neutron scattering spectra, but also computes other quantities.

item.title: MMTK
item.dc:creator: linux4chemistry
item.description: MMTK (the Molecular Modelling Toolkit) is a program library for molecular simulation applications. In addition to providing ready-to-use implementations of standard algorithms, MMTK serves as a code basis that can be easily extended and modified to deal with standard and non-standard problems in molecular simulations.

item.title: pDynamo
item.dc:creator: linux4chemistry
item.description: pDynamo is an open source program library that has been designed for the simulation of molecular systems using quantum chemical (QC), molecular mechanical (MM) and hybrid QC/MM potential energy functions.
